title: Interview 4 – Jonathan Turner: Part 3
description:
Smoothing the Rust dev story

Future work on the RLS, in Rust itself, and in Servo.

Show Notes

Building the Rust Language Service:

  • Language Server Protocol plugins
    • RLS reference VS Code plugin
    • Kalita Alexey's vscode-rust
    • langserver.org
  • The 2017 Rust Roadmap
    • Improved match ergonomics around references
    • const generics
      • RFC #1931

Working on Servo:

  • Servo
    • Windows nightlies
  • LLVM
    • Apple's use on their graphics pipeline:
      • OpenGL
      • Metal
    • clang
    • Swift
  • Project Quantum
  • WebKit
    • KHTML
    • Safari
